etymologies: late Middle English (denoting a person chosen (sometimes by lot) as a sweetheart or special friend): from Old French Valentin, from Latin Valentinus

definitions: a card sent, often anonymously, on St. Valentine's Day (February 14) to a person one loves or is attracted to.
shortDefinitions: card sent on St Valentine's Day

definitions: a person to whom one sends a card on Valentine's Day.
shortDefinitions: person to whom one sends valentine card
